original_title: WWE: Road Warriors - The Life & Death of the Most Dominant Tag-Team in Wrestling History
overview: They "snack on danger, dined on death" for two decades, dominating professional wrestling and immortalizing themselves as the only team ever to hold all three major titles (NWA (WCW), AWA, WWE).
title: WWE: Road Warriors - The Life & Death of the Most Dominant Tag-Team in Wrestling History
